General.Name: Altenergy Acquisition Corp
General.Description: AltEnergy Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses in the renewable energy or related clean technology sectors. AltEnergy Acquisition Corp. was incorporated in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 600 Lexington Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10022
